query: WITH entities AS (SELECT payment_id, id FROM core_obligation_allocations WHERE ((payment_id = $1) AND (COALESCE(id > $3, true))) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT $2) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: ObligationAllocationId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN core_obligation_allocation_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.id asc, i.id, e.sequence
